chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
Ignition Interlock Device Tampering/Failure to Install

result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael A Hoss was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).
  • Ignition Interlock Device Tampering/Failure to Install, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 347.413(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Michael A Hoss in court with attorney Reisha Mitchell.  Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 2 and 3.  Court finds defendant guilty. Ct. 1 dismissed and read-in. 
Bail to be held in trust until a letter is received by the Defendant's mother or the person who posted it. Judge Aprahamian to decide if bail to be refunded or applied to fines. 

Court orders the following:
Ct. 2: 40 days jail w/huber concurrent to Ct. 3 - 2 days credit -  but consecutive to Dodge County Case. Sentence maybe served in Dodge County. Defendant to report to Dodge County on 01/05/15 to commence his sentence from Dodge County. 
- Fine totaling $883.00 to be paid at a rate of $25.00 per month commencing 04/15/2015; alternate 22 days jail - consecutive
- DNA Surcharge of $200.00 - append to fine 


Ct. 3: 40 days jail w/huber concurrent to Ct. 2 - 2 days credit - but consecutive to Dodge County Case. Sentence maybe served in Dodge County. Defendant to report to Dodge County on 01/05/15 to commence his sentence from Dodge County. 
- Fine totaling $442.00 to be paid at a rate of $25.00 per month commencing 04/15/2015 consecutive to Ct. 2; alternate 13 days jail - consecutive
- DNA Surcharge of $200.00 - append to fine
